title: Rob Bell
description: Our first non-comedian guest ever, pastor and author of Love Wins and What We Talk About When We Talk About God ROB BELL makes it wonderful and weird. Between comedy sex and God, I'll let you guess which topic gets the most airtime. Enjoy, weirdos!!
itunes:author: Pete Holmes
